content.question: Congressional oversight refers to the power of Congress to

choices.label: hold public hearings before confirming judicial appointees
exercise some control over executive agencies
allow nongovernmental agencies to defend or refute pending legislation publicly
seek judicial opinion on the constitutionality of pending legislation

content.answer: exercise some control over executive agencies

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
